reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown pointed out that the patch to simplify ovl_lookup_real_one() is unnecessary because a previous commit removed the last use of ovl_lock_rename_workdir(), which was the only caller of this function.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the clarity and formatting of comments in ovl_lookup_real_one(), specifically suggesting to move a kernel-doc comment to the function header for better readability.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed several patches in the series and provided Reviewed-by tags for most of them, indicating his approval.
